segments.source_content: A foundational component for inputting text into the app via a keyboard. Props provide configurability for several features, such as auto-correction, auto-capitalization, placeholder text, and different keyboard types, such as a numeric keypad.

translations.zh-hant: 一個基礎組件，用於透過鍵盤在應用程式中輸入文字。其屬性可配置多種功能，例如自動校正、自動大寫、佔位文字以及不同類型的鍵盤（如數字鍵盤）。

segments.source_content: The most basic use case is to plop down a `TextInput` and subscribe to the `onChangeText` events to read the user input. There are also other events, such as `onSubmitEditing` and `onFocus` that can be subscribed to. A minimal example:

translations.zh-hant: 最基礎的使用方式是放置一個 `TextInput` 並訂閱 `onChangeText` 事件來讀取使用者輸入。還有其他事件如 `onSubmitEditing` 和 `onFocus` 可供訂閱。以下是一個簡單範例：

segments.source_content: Two methods exposed via the native element are .focus() and .blur() that will focus or blur the TextInput programmatically.

translations.zh-hant: 透過原生元素公開的兩個方法是 `.focus()` 和 `.blur()`，可程式化地聚焦或模糊 `TextInput`。

segments.source_content: Note that some props are only available with `multiline={true/false}`. Additionally, border styles that apply to only one side of the element (e.g., `borderBottomColor`, `borderLeftWidth`, etc.) will not be applied if `multiline=true`. To achieve the same effect, you can wrap your `TextInput` in a `View`:

translations.zh-hant: 請注意，某些屬性僅在 `multiline={true/false}` 時可用。此外，若 `multiline=true`，僅應用於元素單邊的邊框樣式（例如 `borderBottomColor`、`borderLeftWidth` 等）將不會生效。要達到相同效果，可將 `TextInput` 包裹在 `View` 中：

segments.source_content: `TextInput` has by default a border at the bottom of its view. This border has its padding set by the background image provided by the system, and it cannot be changed. Solutions to avoid this are to either not set height explicitly, in which case the system will take care of displaying the border in the correct position, or to not display the border by setting `underlineColorAndroid` to transparent.

translations.zh-hant: `TextInput` 預設在其視圖底部有一個邊框。此邊框的內距由系統提供的背景圖片設定，無法更改。解決方案是避免明確設定高度（系統會自動正確顯示邊框），或透過將 `underlineColorAndroid` 設為透明來隱藏邊框。

segments.source_content: Note that on Android performing text selection in an input can change the app's activity `windowSoftInputMode` param to `adjustResize`. This may cause issues with components that have position: 'absolute' while the keyboard is active. To avoid this behavior either specify `windowSoftInputMode` in AndroidManifest.xml ( https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/manifest/activity-element.html ) or control this param programmatically with native code.

translations.zh-hant: 請注意，在 Android 上，輸入框中的文字選取操作可能會將應用的 `windowSoftInputMode` 參數更改為 `adjustResize`。這可能導致鍵盤啟動時，具有 `position: 'absolute'` 的組件出現問題。要避免此行為，可在 AndroidManifest.xml 中指定 `windowSoftInputMode`（https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/manifest/activity-element.html），或透過原生代碼程式化控制此參數。

segments.source_content: Specifies whether fonts should scale to respect Text Size accessibility settings. The default is `true`.

translations.zh-hant: 指定字體是否應縮放以符合「文字大小」輔助設定。預設值為 `true`。

segments.source_content: Tells `TextInput` to automatically capitalize certain characters. This property is not supported by some keyboard types such as `name-phone-pad`.

translations.zh-hant: 指示 `TextInput` 自動將特定字符大寫。此屬性不受某些鍵盤類型支援（如 `name-phone-pad`）。

segments.source_content:
- `characters`: all characters.
- `words`: first letter of each word.
- `sentences`: first letter of each sentence (_default_).
- `none`: don't auto capitalize anything.

translations.zh-hant:
- `characters`：所有字符。
- `words`：每個單詞的首字母。
- `sentences`：每個句子的首字母（_預設值_）。
- `none`：不自動大寫任何內容。

segments.source_content: Specifies autocomplete hints for the system, so it can provide autofill. On Android, the system will always attempt to offer autofill by using heuristics to identify the type of content. To disable autocomplete, set `autoComplete` to `off`.

translations.zh-hant: 為系統指定自動完成提示，以便提供自動填充功能。在 Android 上，系統會始終嘗試透過啟發式識別內容類型來提供自動填充。要禁用自動完成，請將 `autoComplete` 設為 `off`。

segments.source_content: The following values work across platforms:
The following values work on iOS only:
The following values work on Android only:
If `false`, disables auto-correct. The default value is `true`.

translations.zh-hant: 若設為 `false`，則停用自動校正功能。預設值為 `true`。

segments.source_content: If `true`, focuses the input on `componentDidMount` or `useEffect`. The default value is `false`.

translations.zh-hant: 若設為 `true`，則在 `componentDidMount` 或 `useEffect` 時自動聚焦輸入框。預設值為 `false`。

segments.source_content: If `true`, the text field will blur when submitted. The default value is true for single-line fields and false for multiline fields. Note that for multiline fields, setting `blurOnSubmit` to `true` means that pressing return will blur the field and trigger the `onSubmitEditing` event instead of inserting a newline into the field.

translations.zh-hant: 若設為 `true`，文字欄位在提交時會失去焦點。單行欄位預設值為 true，多行欄位則為 false。注意：對多行欄位設定 `blurOnSubmit` 為 `true` 時，按下返回鍵會使欄位失去焦點並觸發 `onSubmitEditing` 事件，而非在欄位中插入換行符號。

segments.source_content: If `true`, caret is hidden. The default value is `false`.

translations.zh-hant: 若設為 `true`，則隱藏輸入游標。預設值為 `false`。

segments.source_content: When the clear button should appear on the right side of the text view. This property is supported only for single-line TextInput component. The default value is `never`.

translations.zh-hant: 決定清除按鈕何時出現在文字輸入框右側。此屬性僅支援單行 TextInput 元件。預設值為 `never`。

segments.source_content: If `true`, clears the text field automatically when editing begins.

translations.zh-hant: 若設為 `true`，開始編輯時會自動清除文字欄位內容。

segments.source_content: If `true`, context menu is hidden. The default value is `false`.

translations.zh-hant: 若設為 `true`，則隱藏上下文選單。預設值為 `false`。

segments.source_content: Determines the types of data converted to clickable URLs in the text input. Only valid if `multiline={true}` and `editable={false}`. By default no data types are detected.

translations.zh-hant: 決定文字輸入中哪些類型的資料會被轉換為可點擊的連結。僅在 `multiline={true}` 且 `editable={false}` 時有效。預設不偵測任何資料類型。

segments.source_content: You can provide one type or an array of many types.

translations.zh-hant: 可指定單一類型或多種類型組成的陣列。

segments.source_content: Provides an initial value that will change when the user starts typing. Useful for use-cases where you do not want to deal with listening to events and updating the value prop to keep the controlled state in sync.

translations.zh-hant: 提供初始值，該值會在使用者開始輸入時改變。適用於不想處理事件監聽與手動更新受控狀態值的場景。

segments.source_content: When provided it will set the color of the cursor (or "caret") in the component. Unlike the behavior of `selectionColor` the cursor color will be set independently from the color of the text selection box.

translations.zh-hant: 設定元件中游標（或稱「插入符」）的顏色。與 `selectionColor` 的行為不同，此屬性會獨立於文字選取框的顏色設定游標顏色。

segments.source_content: When `false`, if there is a small amount of space available around a text input (e.g. landscape orientation on a phone), the OS may choose to have the user edit the text inside of a full screen text input mode. When `true`, this feature is disabled and users will always edit the text directly inside of the text input. Defaults to `false`.

translations.zh-hant: 當值為 `false` 時，若文字輸入周圍可用空間較少（例如手機橫向模式），作業系統可能會讓使用者在全螢幕文字輸入模式中編輯文字。設為 `true` 則會停用此功能，使用者將始終直接在文字輸入框中編輯。預設值為 `false`。

segments.source_content: If `false`, text is not editable. The default value is `true`.

translations.zh-hant: 若為 `false`，文字將無法編輯。預設值為 `true`。

segments.source_content: If `true`, the keyboard disables the return key when there is no text and automatically enables it when there is text. The default value is `false`.

translations.zh-hant: 若為 `true`，鍵盤會在沒有文字時停用返回鍵，並在有文字時自動啟用。預設值為 `false`。

segments.source_content: Determines what text should be shown to the return key. Has precedence over the `returnKeyType` prop.

translations.zh-hant: 決定返回鍵顯示的文字內容。此屬性優先於 `returnKeyType` 屬性。

segments.source_content: The following values work across platforms:

translations.zh-hant: 以下為跨平台支援的值：

segments.source_content: The following values work on Android only:

translations.zh-hant: 以下為僅在 Android 平台有效的值：

segments.source_content: Tells the operating system whether the individual fields in your app should be included in a view structure for autofill purposes on Android API Level 26+. Possible values are `auto`, `no`, `noExcludeDescendants`, `yes`, and `yesExcludeDescendants`. The default value is `auto`.

translations.zh-hant: 告知作業系統是否應將應用程式中的個別欄位納入 Android API 26+ 的自動填充視圖結構。可能值為 `auto`、`no`、`noExcludeDescendants`、`yes` 和 `yesExcludeDescendants`。預設值為 `auto`。

segments.source_content:
- `auto`: Let the Android System use its heuristics to determine if the view is important for autofill.
- `no`: This view isn't important for autofill.
- `noExcludeDescendants`: This view and its children aren't important for autofill.
- `yes`: This view is important for autofill.
- `yesExcludeDescendants`: This view is important for autofill, but its children aren't important for autofill.

translations.zh-hant:
- `auto`：由 Android 系統自行判斷視圖對自動填充的重要性。
- `no`：此視圖對自動填充不重要。
- `noExcludeDescendants`：此視圖及其子視圖對自動填充不重要。
- `yes`：此視圖對自動填充重要。
- `yesExcludeDescendants`：此視圖對自動填充重要，但其子視圖不重要。

segments.source_content: If defined, the provided image resource will be rendered on the left. The image resource must be inside `/android/app/src/main/res/drawable` and referenced like

translations.zh-hant: 若定義此屬性，提供的圖片資源將顯示在輸入框左側。圖片資源必須位於 `/android/app/src/main/res/drawable` 目錄下，並以以下方式引用：

segments.source_content: Padding between the inline image, if any, and the text input itself.

translations.zh-hant: 內嵌圖片（如有）與文字輸入框本身之間的間距。

segments.source_content: An optional identifier which links a custom [InputAccessoryView](inputaccessoryview.md) to this text input. The InputAccessoryView is rendered above the keyboard when this text input is focused.

translations.zh-hant: 可選標識符，用於將自定義的 [InputAccessoryView](inputaccessoryview.md) 與此文字輸入框連結。當此輸入框獲得焦點時，InputAccessoryView 會顯示在鍵盤上方。

segments.source_content: Works like the `inputmode` attribute in HTML, it determines which keyboard to open, e.g. `numeric` and has precedence over `keyboardType`.

translations.zh-hant: 功能類似 HTML 中的 `inputmode` 屬性，決定開啟哪種鍵盤（例如 `numeric`），且優先級高於 `keyboardType`。

segments.source_content: Determines the color of the keyboard.
Determines which keyboard to open, e.g.`numeric`.

translations.zh-hant: 決定開啟哪種鍵盤，例如 `numeric`。

segments.source_content: See screenshots of all the types [here](https://lefkowitz.me/2018/04/30/visual-guide-to-react-native-textinput-keyboardtype-options/).

translations.zh-hant: 所有鍵盤類型的截圖可參見[此處](https://lefkowitz.me/2018/04/30/visual-guide-to-react-native-textinput-keyboardtype-options/)。

segments.source_content: The following values work across platforms:
The following values work on iOS only:

translations.zh-hant: 以下數值僅在 iOS 上有效：

segments.source_content: The following values work on Android only:

translations.zh-hant: 以下數值僅在 Android 上有效：

segments.source_content: Specifies largest possible scale a font can reach when `allowFontScaling` is enabled. Possible values:

translations.zh-hant: 當啟用 `allowFontScaling` 時，指定字體可達到的最大縮放比例。可能數值：

segments.source_content:
- `null/undefined` (default): inherit from the parent node or the global default (0)
- `0`: no max, ignore parent/global default
- `>= 1`: sets the `maxFontSizeMultiplier` of this node to this value

translations.zh-hant:
- `null/undefined`（預設）：繼承父節點或全域預設值（0）
- `0`：無上限，忽略父級/全域預設值
- `>= 1`：將此節點的 `maxFontSizeMultiplier` 設為該值

segments.source_content: Limits the maximum number of characters that can be entered. Use this instead of implementing the logic in JS to avoid flicker.

translations.zh-hant: 限制可輸入的最大字元數。使用此屬性替代在 JS 中實作邏輯，以避免閃爍現象。

segments.source_content: If `true`, the text input can be multiple lines. The default value is `false`.

translations.zh-hant: 若為 `true`，文字輸入框可支援多行輸入。預設值為 `false`。

segments.source_content:
:::note
It is important to note that this aligns the text to the top on iOS, and centers it on Android. Use with `textAlignVertical` set to `top` for the same behavior in both platforms.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note
請注意，這在 iOS 上會將文字對齊頂部，而在 Android 上則會置中。若要讓兩個平台的行為一致，請將 `textAlignVertical` 設為 `top`。
:::

segments.source_content: Sets the number of lines for a `TextInput`. Use it with multiline set to `true` to be able to fill the lines.

translations.zh-hant: 設定 `TextInput` 的行數。需搭配將 `multiline` 設為 `true` 才能填滿這些行。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when the text input is blurred.

translations.zh-hant: 當文字輸入框失去焦點時觸發的回呼函式。

segments.source_content: > Note: If you are attempting to access the `text` value from `nativeEvent` keep in mind that the resulting value you get can be `undefined` which can cause unintended errors. If you are trying to find the last value of TextInput, you can use the [`onEndEditing`](textinput#onendediting) event, which is fired upon completion of editing.

translations.zh-hant: > 注意：若您嘗試從 `nativeEvent` 存取 `text` 值，請注意結果可能是 `undefined`，這可能導致非預期的錯誤。若要取得 TextInput 的最終值，可使用 [`onEndEditing`](textinput#onendediting) 事件，該事件會在編輯完成時觸發。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when the text input's text changes.

translations.zh-hant: 當文字輸入框的文字變更時觸發的回呼函式。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when the text input's text changes. Changed text is passed as a single string argument to the callback handler.

translations.zh-hant: 當文字輸入框的文字變更時觸發的回呼函式。變更後的文字會以單一字串參數的形式傳遞給回呼處理函式。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when the text input's content size changes.

translations.zh-hant: 當文字輸入框的內容大小變更時觸發的回呼函式。

segments.source_content: Only called for multiline text inputs.

translations.zh-hant: 僅適用於多行文字輸入框。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when text input ends.

translations.zh-hant: 當文字輸入結束時觸發的回呼函式。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when a touch is engaged.

translations.zh-hant: 當觸碰開始時觸發的回呼函式。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when a touch is released.

translations.zh-hant: 當觸碰結束時觸發的回呼函式。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when the text input is focused.

translations.zh-hant: 當文字輸入框獲得焦點時觸發的回呼函式。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when a key is pressed. This will be called with object where `keyValue` is `'Enter'` or `'Backspace'` for respective keys and the typed-in character otherwise including `' '` for space. Fires before `onChange` callbacks. Note: on Android only the inputs from soft keyboard are handled, not the hardware keyboard inputs.

translations.zh-hant: 當按鍵被按下時觸發的回呼函式。會傳遞一個物件，其中 `keyValue` 對於「Enter」或「Backspace」鍵會分別回傳對應值，其他按鍵則回傳輸入的字元（包括空格「 」）。此回呼會在 `onChange` 之前觸發。注意：在 Android 上僅處理軟鍵盤的輸入，不處理硬體鍵盤的輸入。

segments.source_content: Invoked on mount and on layout changes.

translations.zh-hant: 在元件掛載或佈局變更時觸發。

segments.source_content: Invoked on content scroll. May also contain other properties from `ScrollEvent` but on Android `contentSize` is not provided for performance reasons.

translations.zh-hant: 當內容滾動時觸發。可能包含來自 `ScrollEvent` 的其他屬性，但在 Android 上基於效能考量不會提供 `contentSize`。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when the text input selection is changed.

translations.zh-hant: 當文字輸入框的選取範圍變更時觸發的回呼函式。

segments.source_content: Callback that is called when the text input's submit button is pressed.

translations.zh-hant: 當文字輸入的提交按鈕被按下時觸發的回調函數。

segments.source_content: Note that on iOS this method isn't called when using `keyboardType="phone-pad"`.

translations.zh-hant: 請注意，在 iOS 上使用 `keyboardType="phone-pad"` 時不會呼叫此方法。

segments.source_content: The string that will be rendered before text input has been entered.

translations.zh-hant: 在文字輸入前顯示的提示字串。

segments.source_content: The text color of the placeholder string.
If `true`, text is not editable. The default value is `false`.

translations.zh-hant: 若為 `true`，則文字不可編輯。預設值為 `false`。

segments.source_content: Sets the return key to the label. Use it instead of `returnKeyType`.

translations.zh-hant: 設定返回鍵的標籤。可替代 `returnKeyType` 使用。

segments.source_content: Determines how the return key should look. On Android you can also use `returnKeyLabel`.

translations.zh-hant: 決定返回鍵的外觀。在 Android 上也可使用 `returnKeyLabel`。

segments.source_content: The following values work across platforms:

translations.zh-hant: 以下值適用於所有平台：

segments.source_content: The following values work on Android only:

translations.zh-hant: 以下值僅在 Android 上有效：

segments.source_content: The following values work on iOS only:

translations.zh-hant: 以下值僅在 iOS 上有效：

segments.source_content: If `true`, allows TextInput to pass touch events to the parent component. This allows components such as SwipeableListView to be swipeable from the TextInput on iOS, as is the case on Android by default. If `false`, TextInput always asks to handle the input (except when disabled). The default value is `true`.

translations.zh-hant: 若為 `true`，允許 TextInput 將觸控事件傳遞給父元件。這使得如 SwipeableListView 等元件能從 TextInput 上滑動（在 Android 上預設即為如此）。若為 `false`，TextInput 總是要求處理輸入（除非被禁用）。預設值為 `true`。

segments.source_content: Sets the number of lines for a `TextInput`. Use it with multiline set to `true` to be able to fill the lines.

translations.zh-hant: 設定 `TextInput` 的行數。需與 `multiline` 設為 `true` 搭配使用以填滿行數。

segments.source_content: If `false`, scrolling of the text view will be disabled. The default value is `true`. Only works with `multiline={true}`.

translations.zh-hant: 若為 `false`，將禁用文字視窗的滾動。預設值為 `true`。僅在 `multiline={true}` 時有效。

segments.source_content: If `true`, the text input obscures the text entered so that sensitive text like passwords stay secure. The default value is `false`. Does not work with `multiline={true}`.

translations.zh-hant: 若為 `true`，文字輸入會隱藏輸入內容以保護如密碼等敏感資訊。預設值為 `false`。不適用於 `multiline={true}`。

segments.source_content: The start and end of the text input's selection. Set start and end to the same value to position the cursor.

translations.zh-hant: 文字輸入選取的起始與結束位置。將起始與結束設為相同值可定位游標。

segments.source_content: The highlight and cursor color of the text input.

translations.zh-hant: 文字輸入框的高亮和游標顏色。

segments.source_content: If `true`, all text will automatically be selected on focus.

translations.zh-hant: 若設為 `true`，當輸入框獲得焦點時會自動選取所有文字。

segments.source_content: When `false`, it will prevent the soft keyboard from showing when the field is focused. The default value is `true`.

translations.zh-hant: 當設為 `false` 時，可防止輸入框獲得焦點時彈出軟鍵盤。預設值為 `true`。

segments.source_content: If `false`, disables spell-check style (i.e. red underlines). The default value is inherited from `autoCorrect`.

translations.zh-hant: 若設為 `false`，會停用拼寫檢查樣式（如紅色底線）。預設值繼承自 `autoCorrect`。

segments.source_content: Align the input text to the left, center, or right sides of the input field.

translations.zh-hant: 將輸入文字對齊至輸入框的左側、中央或右側。

segments.source_content: Give the keyboard and the system information about the expected semantic meaning for the content that users enter.

translations.zh-hant: 向鍵盤和系統提供關於使用者輸入內容預期語義的資訊。

segments.source_content:
:::note
[`autoComplete`](#autocomplete), provides the same functionality and is available for all platforms. You can use [`Platform.select`](/docs/next/platform#select) for differing platform behaviors.

Avoid using both `textContentType` and `autoComplete`. For backwards compatibility, `textContentType` takes precedence when both properties are set.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note
[`autoComplete`](#autocomplete) 提供相同功能且支援全平台。可使用 [`Platform.select`](/docs/next/platform#select) 實現跨平台差異化行為。

請避免同時使用 `textContentType` 和 `autoComplete`。為保持向後兼容性，當兩個屬性同時設定時，`textContentType` 會優先生效。
:::

segments.source_content: You can set `textContentType` to `username` or `password` to enable autofill of login details from the device keychain.

translations.zh-hant: 可將 `textContentType` 設為 `username` 或 `password` 以啟用從裝置鑰匙圈自動填入登入資訊。

segments.source_content: `newPassword` can be used to indicate a new password input the user may want to save in the keychain, and `oneTimeCode` can be used to indicate that a field can be autofilled by a code arriving in an SMS.

translations.zh-hant: `newPassword` 用於標記使用者可能想儲存至鑰匙圈的新密碼輸入欄位，`oneTimeCode` 則用於標記可透過簡訊接收的一次性驗證碼自動填入欄位。
若要停用自動填入功能，請將 `textContentType` 設為 `none`。

- `none`（無）
- `addressCity`（城市）
- `addressCityAndState`（城市與州/省）
- `addressState`（州/省）
- `birthdate`（出生日期，iOS 17+）
- `birthdateDay`（出生日，iOS 17+）
- `birthdateMonth`（出生月，iOS 17+）
- `birthdateYear`（出生年，iOS 17+）
- `countryName`（國家名稱）
- `creditCardExpiration`（信用卡到期日，iOS 17+）
- `creditCardExpirationMonth`（信用卡到期月份，iOS 17+）
- `creditCardExpirationYear`（信用卡到期年份，iOS 17+）
- `creditCardFamilyName`（信用卡持卡人姓氏，iOS 17+）
- `creditCardGivenName`（信用卡持卡人名，iOS 17+）
- `creditCardMiddleName`（信用卡持卡人中間名，iOS 17+）
- `creditCardName`（信用卡持卡人全名，iOS 17+）
- `creditCardNumber`（信用卡號碼）
- `creditCardSecurityCode`（信用卡安全碼，iOS 17+）
- `creditCardType`（信用卡類型，iOS 17+）
- `emailAddress`（電子郵件地址）
- `familyName`（姓氏）
- `fullStreetAddress`（完整街道地址）
- `givenName`（名字）
- `jobTitle`（職稱）
- `location`（位置）
- `middleName`（中間名）
- `name`（姓名）
- `namePrefix`（姓名前綴）
- `nameSuffix`（姓名後綴）
- `newPassword`（新密碼）
- `nickname`（暱稱）
- `oneTimeCode`（一次性驗證碼）
- `organizationName`（組織名稱）
- `password`（密碼）
- `postalCode`（郵遞區號）
- `streetAddressLine1`（街道地址行1）
- `streetAddressLine2`（街道地址行2）
- `sublocality`（次行政區）
- `telephoneNumber`（電話號碼）
- `URL`（網址）
- `username`（使用者名稱）

segments.source_content: When using `textContentType` as `newPassword` on iOS we can let the OS know the minimum requirements of the password so that it can generate one that will satisfy them. In order to create a valid string for `PasswordRules` take a look to the [Apple Docs](https://developer.apple.com/password-rules/).

translations.zh-hant: 在 iOS 上使用 `textContentType` 設為 `newPassword` 時，我們可以讓作業系統了解密碼的最低要求，以便生成符合條件的密碼。要建立有效的 `PasswordRules` 字串，請參閱 [Apple 官方文件](https://developer.apple.com/password-rules/)。

segments.source_content:
> If passwords generation dialog doesn't appear please make sure that:
>
> - AutoFill is enabled: **Settings** → **Passwords & Accounts** → toggle "On" the **AutoFill Passwords**,
> - iCloud Keychain is used: **Settings** → **Apple ID** → **iCloud** → **Keychain** → toggle "On" the **iCloud Keychain**.

translations.zh-hant:
> 如果未出現密碼生成對話框，請確認以下設定：
>
> - 已啟用自動填充功能：**設定** → **密碼與帳號** → 開啟 **自動填充密碼**，
> - 已使用 iCloud 鑰匙圈：**設定** → **Apple ID** → **iCloud** → **鑰匙圈** → 開啟 **iCloud 鑰匙圈**。

segments.source_content: Note that not all Text styles are supported, an incomplete list of what is not supported includes:

translations.zh-hant: 請注意，並非所有文字樣式都受支援，以下是不支援的樣式部分清單：

segments.source_content: Set text break strategy on Android API Level 23+, possible values are `simple`, `highQuality`, `balanced` The default value is `highQuality`.

translations.zh-hant: 在 Android API Level 23+ 上設定文字斷行策略，可能的值為 `simple`、`highQuality`、`balanced`，預設值為 `highQuality`。

segments.source_content: The value to show for the text input. `TextInput` is a controlled component, which means the native value will be forced to match this value prop if provided. For most uses, this works great, but in some cases this may cause flickering - one common cause is preventing edits by keeping value the same. In addition to setting the same value, either set `editable={false}`, or set/update `maxLength` to prevent unwanted edits without flicker.

translations.zh-hant: 文字輸入框顯示的值。`TextInput` 是一個受控元件，這意味著如果提供了此屬性，原生值將強制與之匹配。在大多數情況下，這運作良好，但在某些情況下可能會導致閃爍——常見原因是通過保持相同的值來防止編輯。除了設定相同的值外，可以設定 `editable={false}`，或設定/更新 `maxLength` 以防止不需要的編輯而不會閃爍。

segments.source_content: Set line break strategy on iOS 14+. Possible values are `none`, `standard`, `hangul-word` and `push-out`.

translations.zh-hant: 在 iOS 14+ 上設定換行策略。可能的值為 `none`、`standard`、`hangul-word` 和 `push-out`。

segments.source_content: Makes the native input request focus.

translations.zh-hant: 使原生輸入框請求焦點。

segments.source_content: Makes the native input lose focus.

translations.zh-hant: 使原生輸入框失去焦點。
清除 `TextInput` 中的所有文字。

segments.source_content: Returns `true` if the input is currently focused; `false` otherwise.

translations.zh-hant: 如果輸入框當前處於焦點狀態則返回 `true`；否則返回 `false`。

segments.source_content:
- [react-native#19096](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/19096): Doesn't support Android's `onKeyPreIme`.
- [react-native#19366](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/19366): Calling .focus() after closing Android's keyboard via back button doesn't bring keyboard up again.
- [react-native#26799](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/26799): Doesn't support Android's `secureTextEntry` when `keyboardType="email-address"` or `keyboardType="phone-pad"`.

translations.zh-hant:
- [react-native#19096](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/19096): 不支援 Android 的 `onKeyPreIme`。
- [react-native#19366](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/19366): 在透過返回鍵關閉 Android 鍵盤後呼叫 .focus() 不會再次喚起鍵盤。
- [react-native#26799](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/26799): 當 `keyboardType="email-address"` 或 `keyboardType="phone-pad"` 時不支援 Android 的 `secureTextEntry`。
